duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in developing and maintaining maps for mine planning, quality evaluations, property control, obstacle mitigation, and permitting for mining operations.
Research, propose, and design mechanical components using drafting tools or Computer-Assisted Design (CAD) software.
Repair, troubleshoot, and maintain electrical equipment in mining and surface operations, ensuring compliance with safety regulations.
Assist with various submittals, permit applications, revisions, annual reports, and record-keeping for environmental compliance.
Conduct safety observations, participate in safety audits, and assist with surveying needs for environmental and air quality projects.
Other duties as assigned by the Company.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a degree in Mining, Mechanical, Environmental, Civil, or Electrical Engineering
